description: {"blocks":[{"key":"drkjo","text":"This protocol is designed for  human alpha-synuclein staining using the MJFR1-Alexa 488 (RRID:AB_2537217) antibody and either anti-SynO2  (RRID:AB_2632701) or MJFR-14-6-4-2  (RRID:AB_2714215) antibodies. Tissue stained with this protocol include 35 μm free-floating mouse brain sections. All tissue was from mice perfused with 4% PFA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qm8c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6ahj","text":"Experiments involving animals were conducted according to internationally-accepted standards and were approval from the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee and approved by the State Agency for Nature,\nEnvironment and Consumer Protection in North Rhine Westphalia, Germany.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

forks.title: SOD2 and human alpha-synuclein immunofluorescence staining

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8dgqm","text":"Rinse brain slices (35µ) in TBS (0.05M Trizma base and 0.15M NaCl; pH: 7.6) 3X   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bj4nu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5220f","text":"Quench brain slices in a solution containing 3%H2O2 and 10% Methanol in TBS     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":48,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":50,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"099EB9586DF011EF93280A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"924n1","text":"Rinse brain slices in TBS (0.05M Trizma base and 0.15M NaCl; pH: 7.6) 3X   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bsu9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9go8c","text":"Incubate in blocking buffer (5% donkey serum, 2% BSA, 0.5% triton X-100 in TBS)    hour at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mj4v","text":"Incubate in mouse on mouse blocking buffer (MKB-2213; Vector Lab)   at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cjum","text":"Incubate with anti-SynO2 (1:1000; RRID:AB_2632701) or anti-MJFR-14-6-4-2 (1:20000;\nRRID:AB_2714215) dilution in 50% blocking solution    hour  at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96vk3","text":"Rinse brain slices  in TBS (0.05M Trizma base and 0.15M NaCl; pH: 7.6)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"D082B5D76DF111EF93280A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hhh5","text":"Rinse brain slices in TBS-T (TBS+ 0.25% Triton X-100)) 3X   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab47t","text":"Incubate with rabbit anti-hASYN(1:400; RRID:AB_2537217, MJFR1-Alexa 488)  at 4°C in 50%  blocking buffer  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fepvc","text":"Rinse brain slices in TBS-T (TBS+ 0.25% Triton X-100) 3X   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2deri","text":"Rinse brain slices in TBS-T (TBS+ 0.25% Triton X-100) 2x   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"2C80CBF56DF411EF93280A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8tve","text":"Mount free-floating sections on SuperFrost+ slides (if staining free-floating tissue) and let dry at room temperature for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9185u","text":"Coverslip with fluorescent mounting medium and #1.5 coverslips. Outline coverslip with clear nail polish and store at 4oC .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eubs8","text":"Incubate in fluorescent secondary antibody at 1:200 dilution in 50% blocking buffer   r at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"3ED99BD16DF011EFA3E30A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
